basic.description: In this course students examine how to build and maintain key relationships through understanding themselves and critical relationship process. These key relationships include intimate relationships (dating/marriage partners, children, parents) and professional relationships (clients, coworkers, supervisors).  Course content emphasizes the importance of making purposeful choices in building and maintaining personal and professional relationships.
basic.subject: IFS
basic.title: Relationship Status: It's Complicated - Understanding and Influencing Intimate Relationships
